recipesJson.name: Cranberry vanilla cheesecake
recipesJson.author: Chrisdvr1
recipesJson.description: This is the recipe I should have submitted to the competition pretty tasty shake and vape. The cheesecake doesn't really start to come out until after a week.

reviews.text: Ya this is better than the one you submitted to the contest. This juice has been my ADV for a few weeks now. Made a little and tried it over the course of a steep.  Made another 240mls.  One of my favorite recipes so far, thank you.
